header.title: EI Library Reference

description.p: The ei library is a C interface library for communication with Erlang.

note.p: By default, the ei library is only guaranteed to be compatible with other Erlang/OTP components from the same release as the ei library itself. See the documentation of the ei_set_compat_rel() function on how to communicate with Erlang/OTP components from earlier releases.
